sentences.english: This section introduces several of the most prominent conventions.
sentences.chinese: 本節介紹了最突出的公約數。

sentences.english: NATO is how you abbreviate the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
sentences.chinese: 北大西洋公約組織常被縮寫成NATO。

sentences.english: The leadership issued a statement denying any favoritism.
sentences.chinese: 公約領導層發表一份聲明表示否認有任何偏袒。

sentences.english: Documents related to the regional anti-terrorism organization will have to be formulated within the framework of the Communiqué.
sentences.chinese: 有關地區反恐怖機構的文件要在公約的框架內製定。

sentences.english: China is a contracting party to the International Convention on the Harmonised Commodity Description and Coding System.
sentences.chinese: 我國是《商品名稱和編碼的協調製度公約》締約國。

sentences.english: Is there a relationship between priors and conventions?
sentences.chinese: 是否有關係厄斯和公約？

sentences.english: The weapons are now outlawed by international agreement in most countries.
sentences.chinese: 如今大部分國家都簽署了禁止化學武器的國際公約。

sentences.english: Iran is a signatory to this convention.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗是這一公約的簽署國。

sentences.english: 1899 - The First Hague Convention is signed.
sentences.chinese: 1899年的今天，首個《海牙公約》被簽署。

sentences.english: "Aarhus Convention" is the milestone of environmental information disclosure system.
sentences.chinese: 《奧胡斯公約》是環境信息公開制度發展的里程碑。

sentences.english: They need their governments to implement the WHO Framework Convention.
sentences.chinese: 他們還需要其政府實施世衛組織框架公約。

sentences.english: There hangs straight on the wall of this grocery a service pledge.
sentences.chinese: 這家副食店在牆上端端正正掛着一張服務公約。

sentences.english: Programmes by the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification were underfunded, she said.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國的防治荒漠化國際公約項目資金不足，她說。

sentences.english: This convention is something that we all committed to.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有人都已對此公約作出承諾。

sentences.english: Wetland centres' importance is recognised by the Ramsar Convention on Wetlands.
sentences.chinese: 溼地中心的重要性已經得到了《溼地公約》的認可。

sentences.english: None of them was a part of the Navy of any member states of the Warsaw Treaty Organisation.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一艘艦艇在華沙公約組織成員國海軍服役過。
